about.title: About Me
about.firstParagraph: I'm a full-stack software developer with a passion for creating engaging digital experiences. With a solid background in front-end and graphic design, I combine technical skills with an aesthetic vision to develop innovative solutions.
about.secondParagraph: My goal is to develop modern and scalable solutions that exceed expectations. I value collaboration and teamwork, as well as sharing knowledge with other developers.

list.description: Led front-end development, ensuring scalability and maintainability through architecture and code quality; Collaborated with design and back-end teams to ensure seamless integration of complex user interfaces and functionalities; Developed and improved the platform to ensure compliance with accessibility standards and performance optimization.

Led front-end development team, ensuring high quality deliveries. Proactively collaborated with the UX/UI team to improve the user experience by implementing innovative and interactive designs. Mentored other developers to expand their skills in Next.js, React and Typescript.
Managed and developed websites, pages and e-commerce, ensuring stability and usability, which impacted customer retention. Created and documented development processes, reducing onboarding time.
Developed management platforms for social projects, automating tasks. Implemented custom software to meet the unique demands of ecclesiastical environments.

Implemented a system to visualize the data generated by the company's main product, which boosted users' perception of it and increased sales. Assisted in the development of features in communication between modules, reducing bottlenecks in the system.
